snippet.title: The Talos Principle VR Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Coming to VR in 2017.

The Talos Principle VR is a virtual reality version of Croteam's critically acclaimed first-person puzzle game in the tradition of philosophical science fiction.

For all things The Talos Principle check out the official social media channels:
🐦 http://twitter.com/thetalosprinciple
👍 http://facebook.com/talosprinciple

Follow Croteam on Twitter and Instagram, like us on Facebook and don’t forget to join our ever-growing Croteam family on Discord and Reddit:
💬 http://discord.gg/croteam
🤩 http://reddit.com/r/croteam
🐦 http://twitter.com/croteam
👍 http://facebook.com/croteam
📸 http://instagram.com/officialcroteam
